name: Biological Imperatives
description: John Frederick Paxton has returned, intent on building a movement to oppose all interspecies breeding. Work with Kim and T'Pol to crush Paxton's movement before it starts.
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Paxton, Kim, or T'Pol will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Paxton, Kim, or T'Pol
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Saru
featured_crew.flavor: Captain Saru consults his first officer Tilly for recommendations on pithy catchphrases.

featured_crew.name: Kim
featured_crew.flavor: After the original Voyager’s Kim is killed in a battle with the Viidians, an alternate Voyager sends their own Kim to the original ship with Naomi Wildman in hand.

featured_crew.name: T'Pol
featured_crew.flavor: Promoted to the rank of Commander after joining Starfleet in 2154.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Captain Saru consults his first officer Tilly for recommendations on pithy catchphrases.

rewards.name: T'Pol
rewards.flavor: Promoted to the rank of Commander after joining Starfleet in 2154.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Saru
rewards.flavor: Captain Saru consults his first officer Tilly for recommendations on pithy catchphrases.

rewards.name: T'Pol
rewards.flavor: Promoted to the rank of Commander after joining Starfleet in 2154.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: T'Pol
rewards.flavor: Promoted to the rank of Commander after joining Starfleet in 2154.

rewards.name: Kim
rewards.flavor: After the original Voyager’s Kim is killed in a battle with the Viidians, an alternate Voyager sends their own Kim to the original ship with Naomi Wildman in hand.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Let the Augments show Paxton true superiority.
Show the merits of cooperation with the KCA.

screens.text: "John Frederick Paxton has entered this timeline. He predates the NX-01's encounter with him, but retains the same odious views on humanity's genetic superiority."

"Maybe this is a chance to change those views. This version says he'd never do the things history says he did. Maybe we can catch him and intervene before whatever turning point makes him change his mind."

"Paxton is lying. He will say anything, do anything, in order to advance his agenda. Even... even give life to a child, knowing it would die. We have no proof of his plans yet, but I am certain we will find some if we surveil him carefully."
"John Frederick Paxton has entered this timeline. He predates the NX-01's encounter with him, but retains the same odious views on humanity's genetic superiority."

"Maybe this is a chance to change those views. This version says he'd never do the things history says he did. Maybe we can catch him and intervene before whatever turning point makes him change his mind."

"Paxton is lying. He will say anything, do anything, in order to advance his agenda. Even... even give life to a child, knowing it would die. We have no proof of his plans yet, but I am certain we will find some if we surveil him carefully."
"Commander T'Pol was right. There's no hope for Paxton, not with what he's planning. It's... it's monstrous."

responses.text: "How could he possibly do that? Life always finds a way."
"That seems proof enough to arrest him. I'll warm up the brig."
"No one would blame you if you decided this was all too close to home, Commander."

screens.text: "Paxton has expanded his views on interbreeding between non-humans and humans to encompass all interspecies breeding. He intends to take action to ensure that it becomes impossible to do so, forever."
"Paxton is only the head of a incubating snake. We have to destroy his movement in full, or we risk making him look like a martyr."
"I am perfectly able to perform my duties. Not only to my uniform, but to my daughter's memory."

"From what we've seen, Paxton's working with scientists to introduce a series of gene variants, one for every known species that successfully interbred. If they work, interspecies breeding will become impossible--hybrid children won't survive."
"We've got scientists, too. We can be proactive, find a way to nullify Paxton's gene variants, and then expose his plans to the universe. People will turn on him then. They have to."
"Commander T'Pol was right. There's no hope for Paxton, not with what he's planning. It's... it's monstrous."

responses.text: "How could he possibly do that? Life always finds a way."
"That seems proof enough to arrest him. I'll warm up the brig."
"No one would blame you if you decided this was all too close to home, Commander."

screens.text: "Paxton has expanded his views on interbreeding between non-humans and humans to encompass all interspecies breeding. He intends to take action to ensure that it becomes impossible to do so, forever."
"Paxton is only the head of a incubating snake. We have to destroy his movement in full, or we risk making him look like a martyr."
"I am perfectly able to perform my duties. Not only to my uniform, but to my daughter's memory."

"From what we've seen, Paxton's working with scientists to introduce a series of gene variants, one for every known species that successfully interbred. If they work, interspecies breeding will become impossible--hybrid children won't survive."
"We've got scientists, too. We can be proactive, find a way to nullify Paxton's gene variants, and then expose his plans to the universe. People will turn on him then. They have to."
